sentence: I've been seeing flashing lights now for about a week, it only happens when I touch my eye.
Three weeks ago his eye started to bleed.
Just moments ago, I experienced sudden blurred vision in my left eye.
About a week ago I started experiencing ear aches that would almost take me to my knee's.
I have no pains in my neck.
My son aged 4 years is known to have complete loss of vision in his left eye due to poor optic nerve.
Since 3 days I can feel something in my left eye.
When I press the eye ball i can feel the pain.
My eyes recently have been extremely dry and sensitive to light.
About five days ago I woke up with a red left eye and swollen eyelids.
I've also been having mucosy discharge from eye since then that has matted my eyelids together in the morning.
I woke up two days ago with redness in my right eye.
I am a 20 year old male experiencing eye pain and occasional headaches.
My name is Juli and I have been suffering from dry eyes for a long time.
It began when i started to have dizziness and headache 3 years ago.
My left eye waters almost continuously.
I believe the water is causing my vision to be blurry.
My nose is started getting cold and my left teeth were very sensitive to cold.
I have had a twitch in my eye for three months now.
I also have a constant pressure behind my eye as well as pain when i squeeze my eyes.
Last night I had a sudden and intense pain behind my left eye.
It burned somewhat and my eye watered quite a bit but then as sudden as it had came, it went away.
My symptoms now are: severly dry eyes in the morning, terrible light sensitivity.
I feel disoriented and my eyes feel very strained, tired and heavy after 2 hours of continuous use on one task.
I occasionally feel sharp pain in the back of my eye and I have headaches in the back of my head and temples.
I've had swelling on my upper eyelid of my left eye, and there's some pain on the left side of my eye as well.
About four days ago I started having pain in one of my eyes.
Over the last few months I have started to notice that my left eye becomes red and bloodshot after prolong use of the computer.
On cold windy days my left eye always start to tear up.
Now I get a throbbing pain in the corner of my eye up my bridge of my nose and forehead, I have a fever and real bad headaches.
I also have a mucus laden cough, runny nose.
My 5 year old son woke up with redness in his eyes.
I have something wrong with my top left eyelid it is swollen.
I have noticed a white spot in my vision lately.
I'm 17, and for the past two years I've noticed that i have been getting a lot of mucous in my eyes.
I recently experienced sudden temporary double vision.
Both eyes seem to have small cuts at the corners and they are both red.
For the past few days, my left eye has been "tearing".
When I lay in bed in the morning my eyesight is blurry.
I have noticed that for a whole month now my left eye has twitched non stop.
My vision is distorted.
I've had almost constant pain in my eyes especially my right eye.
My left eye has a small lump too in the same spot.
My eyes get teary so easily when I start to laugh, even a soft laugh.
My eyes hurt all of the time.
I have been having right eye pain in the corner of the eye.
The next morning there was redness in the white part of eye and it was obvious that it was hit.
I have full dry eye on both eyes.
